title: Capstone Project: The Autonomous Humanoid
description:
## Learning Objectives
 Integrate all learned modules to create a full voice-to-action pipeline for a humanoid robot.
 Implement advanced path planning and obstacle avoidance algorithms.
 Develop robust object manipulation capabilities.
 Demonstrate autonomous behavior in complex environments.

## Prerequisites & Hardware Checklist
 Software Digital Twin workstation, NVIDIA Jetson Orin (for deployment), RealSense camera, optional End-to-End Autonomous Humanoid System
 Code
     Voice command processing (Whisper + GPT).
     High-level action planning.
     Low-level motion control (kinematics, dynamics).
     Perception (VSLAM, object detection).
     Navigation (path planning, obstacle avoidance).
     Manipulation (grasping, object placement).
 Activity A simulated (or physical) humanoid robot successfully performing a multi-step autonomous task based on voice commands.

## Sim-to-Real Bridge
 Concept: The capstone project emphasizes the complete sim-to-real workflow, from developing and testing complex behaviors in simulation to deploying and validating them on real humanoid hardware.

## Quiz / Reflection Questions
1. What are the main challenges in integrating multiple AI and robotics components into a single autonomous system?
2. How would you design a robust error recovery mechanism for an autonomous humanoid?
3. Propose an advanced task for the autonomous humanoid beyond object manipulation.
